article_title: Quicksilver Resources Bankruptcy Auction Set for December
article_text:
Texas’s Quicksilver Resources Inc. will go on the auction block in December, hoping to line up a sale that eluded it before it filed for bankruptcy protection.

Judge Laurie Selber Silverstein signed off on rules to govern the bidding on the oil-and-gas company at a hearing Tuesday in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Wilmington, Del. Quicksilver’s Canadian assets, which aren’t caught up in the bankruptcy action, are also being offered for...
